title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Check the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
